description.value:
Implants Blades and thin Scalpels into user's hands. Is unpleasent to look at. Grants +5 to Medicae and Interrogation Tests. Can be used as a melee weapon, dealing 1d5+2 Damage with Penetration 2. Good vcersions gain Tearing Quality. Best Versions gain Toxic Quality. Poor Versions have no Penetration and only deal 1d5 Damage.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
